Ky DUONG

Hello everyone, I'm Ky, a Vietnamese guy who loves eating very much. I have just married, I love my wife so much (please let her know about it). I'm very fat and I rarely smile or laugh when I take a photo. I passionate with Maths and the way it works. I am working on a blow-up problem, my supervisor is Mr. Hatem Zaag. Nice to meet you all.

Research

  • Duong Giao Ky, Van Tien Nguyen, and Hatem Zaag. “Construction of a stable blowup solution with a prescribed behavior for a non-scaling-invariant semilinear heat equation”. Tunisian Journal of Mathematics. 1.1 (2018): 13-45

  • Duong Giao Ky. “Profile for the imaginary part of a blowup solution for a complex-valued seminar heat equation”. arXiv preprint arXiv:1712.07183. (2017)

  • Duong Giao Ky. “A blowup solution of a complex semi-linear heat equation with an irrational power”. arXiv preprint arXiv:1804.00560. (2018)

  • Duong Giao Ky, and Hatem Zaag. “Profile of touch-down solution to a nonlocal MEMS model”. arXiv preprint arXiv:1811.11483. (2018)
